EmailTemplate.name: test
EmailTemplate.subject: Can't wait to see you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
%%subject%%
Tomorrow's the big day! Email not displaying correctly? View it in your browser.
Hi %%first_name%%,
Tomorrow's the big day! We can't wait to finally welcome you into the Legend Family. We have some detailed instructions for you to make the pick up and orientation process as enjoyable as possible.
Again, a big congratulations on joining the Legend Family and if you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. See you tomorrow!
Sincerely, %%Sales_Consultant%% Legend Boats Orientation Specialist.
FIND A DEALER NEAR YOU:
www.legendboats.com | info@legendboats.com | Phone: 1-800-461-4050
